file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 12-21-11-03 - SPRING CARTRIDGE - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SPRING CARTRIDGE - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to lubricate the gust-lock spring cartridges. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 12-21-11-600-801-A SPRING CARTRIDGE - LUBRICATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 12-21-11 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 12-21-11-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SPRING CARTRIDGE - LUBRICATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to lubricate the gust-lock spring cartridges. (2) The approved grease to lubricate the spring cartridge is: • Lubricant Molykote DC-33 Light B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-71-03-000-801-A/400 SPRING CARTRIDGES - REMOVAL AMM TASK 27-71-03-400-801-A/400 SPRING CARTRIDGES - INSTALLATION IPC 27-71-00 GUST LOCK ELECTROMECHANICAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 321 321 Tail boom D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber Gloves resistant to Phosphate- Protection for the hands 1 available Ester Base fluid Commercially Rubber Gloves resistant to Phosphate- Protection for the eyes 1 available Ester Base fluid F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Shim IPC 27-71-00 AR H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Horizontal stabilizer EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-21-11 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Job Set-Up SUBTASK 940-002-A (1) Remove the spring cartridge. Refer to AMM TASK 27-71-03-000-801-A/400. J. Lubrication SUBTASK 640-002-A WARNING: • MAKE SURE THAT THE RUDDER, HORIZONTAL STABILIZER, AND ELEVATOR CANNOT BE OPERATED ACCIDENTALLY. AN ACCIDENTAL OPERATION CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS. (1) Apply a thin layer of grease on the spring cartridge surface. K. Job Close-Up SUBTASK 940-003-A (1) Install the spring cartridge. Refer to AMM TASK 27-71-03-400-801-A/400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-21-11 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
